item.title: Crashplan PROe
item.description:
Introduction

In this tutorial I will cover how to setup a CrashPlan PROE server hosted in Docker container running on a Synology.

item.title: Munki with SSL using Docker
item.description:
Introduction

In this tutorial I will cover how to setup an Munki environment with client SSL authentication. Hosting the munki data and web server in docker and using a osx machine for populating data using Autopkgr. Most guides out there use Chef or Puppet to push client configuration but I wanted to focus on docker and have the possibility to move between solutions depending on situation and current infrastructure.

item.title: VMware-Fusion Docker-machine
item.description:
Introduction

In this tutorial I will cover how I a docker-machine lab environment using VMWare Fusion.

item.title: Dockers
item.description:
Stuff I learnd and use with dockers.

I'm using a Apple Mac with VMware Fusion and the latest Docker Toolbox. Docker default configuration is to use Virtualbox so I added some tips how to use VMware Fusion instead, also added some more cpu and memory if I need some more beef for full system containers.

item.description: Here is a tutorial to set up the DNS on your Synology box.

item.title: AWS day to day
item.description: I love working from the console and aws-cli could be your best friend. Guide how to install this on you system can be found on Getting Set Up with the AWS Command Line Interface.
